trans-unit.source: Implement to participate in the creation or choosing of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object, especially to enable shared sessions.
trans-unit.target: Implementar participar a criação ou a escolha de um <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> objeto, especialmente para permitir sessões compartilhadas.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IInstanceContextProvider interface to provide the appropriate <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object to the system.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface IInstanceContextProvider para fornecer apropriada <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>objeto para o sistema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is implemented to support shared sessions, enable service instance pooling, control lifetimes of service instances, or to group contexts among clients.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, essa interface é implementada para dar suporte a sessões compartilhadas, ativar pool de instância de serviço, controlar o tempo de vida de instâncias de serviço ou para contextos de grupo entre clientes.

trans-unit.source: For example, to implement sharing, insert a custom IInstanceContextProvider to decide which session or call from a client is associated with which <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para implementar o compartilhamento, insira um IInstanceContextProvider personalizado para decidir qual sessão ou a chamada de um cliente é associada com a qual <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo que demonstra o compartilhamento de contextos de instância, consulte [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When an IInstanceContextProvider is inserted into [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the normal property that controls the creation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects (the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) is no longer checked and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > IInstanceContextProvider um quando é inserido no [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], a propriedade normal que controla a criação de <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objetos (o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade) não está marcada e não tem nenhum efeito.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: A more generic mechanism by which you can initialize <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects when created (for example, to attach custom extensions to each <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) is the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo mais genérico pelo qual você pode inicializar <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objetos quando criado (por exemplo, para anexar extensões personalizadas para cada <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) é <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when a new message is received.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma nova mensagem é recebida.

trans-unit.source: The GetExistingInstanceContext method is called when a message is received.
trans-unit.target: O método GetExistingInstanceContext é chamado quando uma mensagem é recebida.

trans-unit.source: Return the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that you want to process the message, or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Retornar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>do objeto que você deseja processar a mensagem, ou `null`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: In the case of `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object for the message and then calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: No caso de `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cria um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto para a mensagem e, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If you return `null`, the new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object goes through the throttling system and increments the count of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se você retornar `null`, o novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto passa pelo sistema de limitação e incrementa a contagem de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: O canal que recebeu a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object that is used to process the message; return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> objeto que é usado para processar a mensagem; retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para instruir [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para criar um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é retornado a partir de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>

trans-unit.source: InitializeInstanceContext is called when <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A> returns `null` and a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created.
trans-unit.target: InitializeInstanceContext é chamado quando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>retorna `null` e um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto é criado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called to notify you that a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has been created.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado para notificar que uma nova <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>foi criado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: O canal que recebeu a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Called when all <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> activities have completed to enable implementers to prevent the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> from being recycled.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando todos os <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>atividades tiverem sido concluídas para habilitar os implementadores impedir que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>de ser reciclado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: IsIdle is called when [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is about to close and recycle an idle <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object so that you can inform the runtime whether to continue doing so.
trans-unit.target: IsIdle é chamado quando [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] está prestes a fechar e reciclar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto de modo que você pode informar se deseja continuar fazendo o SO. o tempo de execução</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> do ocioso

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo que demonstra o compartilhamento de contextos de instância, consulte [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that is considered idle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto que é considerado ocioso.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is to close and recycle the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object and adjust the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] é fechar e reciclar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>de objeto e ajustar o valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable implementers to provide a callback to notify [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is finished.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para habilitar os implementadores fornecer um retorno de chamada para notificar [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto for concluído.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>

trans-unit.source: The NotifyIdle method is called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> method returns `false` to enable you to provide [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object that you use to inform the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work.
trans-unit.target: O método NotifyIdle é chamado quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>método retorna `false` para que você possa fornecer [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] com um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>que você usa para informar o tempo de execução do objeto que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>concluiu seu trabalho.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> once again.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>objeto notifica o tempo de execução que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>concluiu seu trabalho, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] chamadas <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>novamente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Esse ciclo continua até <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>retorna `true` e o contexto é fechado e reciclado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"></xref> object that notifies [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is to be closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"> </xref> objeto notifica [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objeto é fechado e reciclados.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> Atual
